statements: SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT item_name, location FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse';
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE usage_description IS NULL;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Warehouse' ORDER BY item_name ASC
SELECT item_name, quantity, location FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT item_id, item_name, location FROM inventory WHERE location = 'Storage' AND quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY item_id
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE usage_description LIKE '%fragile%' OR usage_description LIKE '%handle with care%' ORDER BY item_name
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity, location, usage_description FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 AND location != 'Warehouse' ORDER BY quantity ASC
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT item_id, item_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment ORDER BY last_maintenance_date ASC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01' AND item_name LIKE 'Bandage%' ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity FROM equipment WHERE last_maintenance_date < '2021-06-30' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND expiration_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY item_id;
SELECT item_name, quantity, expiration_date FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity < 50 OR expiration_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT equipment_name, condition FROM equipment ORDER BY equipment_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM patient_care WHERE discharge_date IS NULL;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, expiry_date FROM medical_supplies WHERE expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM medical_supplies ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT supply_name, expiry_date FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT patient_name, admission_date, discharge_date FROM patient_care WHERE discharge_date IS NULL;
SELECT equipment_name, quantity, condition FROM equipment WHERE condition = 'Good' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT item_name, location FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE location='Warehouse A' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM Suppliers WHERE contact_person IS NOT NULL AND email LIKE '%@example.com';

SELECT Orders.order_id, Inventory.item_name, Suppliers.supplier_name, Orders.quantity FROM Orders INNER JOIN Inventory ON Orders.item_id = Inventory.item_id INNER JOIN Suppliers ON Orders.supplier_id = Suppliers.supplier_id WHERE Orders.quantity > 10 ORDER BY Orders.order_date DESC;
SELECT Patients.patient_name, Patients.date_of_birth, Orders.quantity FROM Patients LEFT JOIN Orders ON Patients.patient_id = Orders.item_id WHERE Orders.quantity < 5;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE unit_price > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id IN (2, 4);
SELECT department_name, head_of_department FROM departments WHERE department_id = 3;
SELECT order_id, item_name, quantity, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT item_name, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE unit_price >= 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, email FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id < 5 ORDER BY supplier_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT department_name, head_of_department FROM departments ORDER BY department_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, purchase_date, quantity FROM purchases WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
